original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Iddhibalavagga
analyzed: iddhi bala vagga

original: 3. Devadattapabbajjapañha
analyzed: devadatta pabbajja pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, devadatto kena pabbājito”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena devadatto kena pabbājito ti

original: “Chayime, mahārāja, khattiyakumārā bhaddiyo ca anuruddho ca ānando ca bhagu ca kimilo
analyzed: chayime mahā rāja khattiya kumārāḥ bhaddiyaḥ ca anuruddhaḥ ca ānandaḥ ca bhagu ca kimilaḥ

original: ca devadatto ca upālikappako sattamo abhisambuddhe satthari sakyakulānandajanane
analyzed: ca devadatto ca upāli kappako sattamaḥ abhisambuddhe satthari sakya kula ānanda janane

original: bhagavantaṁ anupabbajantā nikkhamiṁsu, te bhagavā pabbājesī”ti.
analyzed: bhagavantam anupabbajantāḥ nikkhamisu te bhagavā pabbājesi iti

original: “Nanu, bhante, devadattena pabbajitvā saṅgho bhinno”ti?
analyzed: nanu bhante devadattena pabbajitvā saṅghaḥ bhinnaḥ ti

original: “Āma, mahārāja, devadattena pabbajitvā saṅgho bhinno, na gihī saṅghaṁ bhindati, na
analyzed: āma mahā rāja devadattena pabbajitvā saṅghaḥ bhinnaḥ na gihī saṅgham bhindati na

original: bhikkhunī, na sikkhamānā, na sāmaṇero, na sāmaṇerī saṅghaṁ bhindati, bhikkhu pakatatto
analyzed: bhikkhunī na sikkhamānā na sāmaṇeraḥ na sāmaṇerī saṅgham bhindati bhikkhu pakatattaḥ

original: samānasaṁvāsako samānasīmāyaṁ ṭhito saṅghaṁ bhindatī”ti.
analyzed: samāna sa vāsakaḥ samāna sīmā ayam ṭhitaḥ saṅgham bhindati iti

original: “Saṅghabhedako, bhante, puggalo kiṁ kammaṁ phusatī”ti?
analyzed: saṅgha bhedakaḥ bhante puggalo kim kammam phusati iti

original: “Kappaṭṭhitikaṁ, mahārāja, kammaṁ phusatī”ti.
analyzed: kappaṭṭhitika mahā rāja kammam phusati iti

original: “Kiṁ pana, bhante nāgasena, buddho jānāti ‘devadatto pabbajitvā saṅghaṁ bhindissati, saṅghaṁ bhinditvā kappaṁ niraye paccissatī’”ti?
analyzed: kim pana bhante nāgasena buddhaḥ jānāti devadattaḥ pabbajitvā saṅgham bhindissati saṅgham bhinditvā kappam niraye paccissati iti

original: “Āma, mahārāja, tathāgato jānāti ‘devadatto pabbajitvā saṅghaṁ bhindissati, saṅghaṁ bhinditvā kappaṁ niraye paccissatī’”ti.
analyzed: āma mahā rāja tathāgataḥ jānāti devadattaḥ pabbajitvā saṅgham bhindissati saṅgham bhinditvā kappam niraye paccissati iti

original: “Yadi, bhante nāgasena, buddho jānāti ‘devadatto pabbajitvā saṅghaṁ bhindissati,
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena buddhaḥ jānāti devadattaḥ pabbajitvā saṅgham bhindissati

original: saṅghaṁ bhinditvā kappaṁ niraye paccissatī’ti, tena hi, bhante nāgasena, buddho kāruṇiko
analyzed: saṅgham bhinditvā kappam niraye paccissati iti tena hi bhante nāgasena buddhaḥ kāruṇikaḥ

original: anukampako hitesī sabbasattānaṁ ahitaṁ apanetvā hitamupadahatīti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: anukampakaḥ hita īsī sabba sattānam ahitam apanetvā hitam upadahati iti yam tam micchā

original: Yadi taṁ ajānitvā pabbājesi, tena hi buddho asabbaññūti, ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho
analyzed: yadi tam a jānitvā pabbājesi tena hi buddhaḥ a sabbaññu iti ayam pi ubhatas koṭikaḥ pañho

original: tavānuppatto, vijaṭehi etaṁ mahājaṭaṁ, bhinda parāpavādaṁ, anāgate addhāne tayā sadisā
analyzed: tava anuppattaḥ vijaṭehi etam mahā jaṭa bhinda para apavāda anāgate tayā sadisā

original: buddhimanto bhikkhū dullabhā bhavissanti, ettha tava balaṁ pakāsehī”ti.
analyzed: buddhimantaḥ bhikkhū dullabhāḥ bhavissanti ettha tava balam pakāsehi iti

original: “Kāruṇiko, mahārāja, bhagavā sabbaññū ca, kāruññena, mahārāja, bhagavā sabbaññutañāṇena
analyzed: kāruṇikaḥ mahā rāja bhagavā sabbaññū ca kāruññena mahā rāja bhagavā sabbaññu ta ñāṇena

original: devadattassa gatiṁ olokento addasa devadattaṁ āpāyikaṁ kammaṁ āyūhitvā anekāni kappakoṭisatasahassāni
analyzed: devadattassa gatim olokentaḥ addasa devadattam āpāyikam kammam āyūhitvā anekāni kappa koṭi sata sahassāni

original: nirayena nirayaṁ vinipātena vinipātaṁ gacchantaṁ, taṁ bhagavā sabbaññutañāṇena jānitvā
analyzed: nirayena nirayam vinipātena vinipātam gacchanta tam bhagavā sabbaññuta ñāṇena jānitvā

original: imassa apariyantakataṁ kammaṁ mama sāsane pabbajitassa pariyantakataṁ bhavissati,
analyzed: imassa apariyanta katam kammam mama sāsane pabbajitassa pariyanta katam bhavissati

original: purimaṁ upādāya pariyantakataṁ dukkhaṁ bhavissati, apabbajitopi ayaṁ moghapuriso
analyzed: purimam upādāya pariyanta katam dukkham bhavissati a pabbajitaḥ api ayam mogha puriso

original: kappaṭṭhiyameva kammaṁ āyūhissatīti kāruññena devadattaṁ pabbājesī”ti.
analyzed: kappaṭṭhiyam eva kammam āyūhissati iti kāruññena devadattam pabbājesi iti

original: “Tena hi, bhante nāgasena, buddho vadhitvā telena makkheti, papāte pātetvā hatthaṁ deti, māretvā jīvitaṁ pariyesati, yaṁ so paṭhamaṁ dukkhaṁ datvā pacchā sukhaṁ upadahatī”ti?
analyzed: tena hi bhante nāgasena buddhaḥ vadhitvā telena makkheti papāte pātetvā hattham deti māretvā jīvitam pariyesati yam so paṭhamam dukkham da tvā pacchā sukham upadahati iti

original: “Vadhetipi, mahārāja, tathāgato sattānaṁ hitavasena, pātetipi sattānaṁ hitavasena,
analyzed: vadha itipi mahā rāja tathāgataḥ sattānam hita vasena pāta itipi sattānam hita vasena

original: māretipi sattānaṁ hitavasena, vadhitvāpi, mahārāja, tathāgato sattānaṁ hitameva upadahati,
analyzed: sattānam hita vasena vadhitvā api mahā rāja tathāgataḥ sattānam hitam eva upadahati

original: pātetvāpi sattānaṁ hitameva upadahati, māretvāpi sattānaṁ hitameva upadahati.
analyzed: pātetvā api sattānam hitam eva upadahati māretvā api sattānam hitam eva upadahati

original: Yathā, mahārāja, mātāpitaro nāma vadhitvāpi pātayitvāpi puttānaṁ hitameva upadahanti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja mātā pitaraḥ nāma vadhitvā api pātayitvā api puttānam hitam eva upadahanti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato vadhetipi sattānaṁ hitavasena, pātetipi sattānaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgataḥ vadha itipi sattānam hita vasena

original: hitavasena, māretipi sattānaṁ hitavasena, vadhitvāpi, mahārāja, tathāgato sattānaṁ
analyzed: hita vasena sattānam hita vasena vadhitvā api mahā rāja tathāgataḥ

original: hitameva upadahati, pātetvāpi sattānaṁ hitameva upadahati, māretvāpi sattānaṁ hitameva
analyzed: hitam eva upadahati pātetvā api sattānam hitam eva upadahati māretvā api sattānam hitam eva

original: upadahati, yena yena yogena sattānaṁ guṇavuḍḍhi hoti, tena tena yogena sabbasattānaṁ hitameva upadahati.
analyzed: upadahati yena yena yogena sattānam guṇa vuḍḍhi hoti tena tena yogena sabba sattānam hitam eva upadahati

original: Sace, mahārāja, devadatto na pabbājeyya, gihibhūto samāno nirayasaṁvattanikaṁ bahuṁ
analyzed: sace mahā rāja devadattaḥ na pabbājeyya gihi bhūtaḥ samānaḥ niraya savattanikam bahu

original: pāpakammaṁ katvā anekāni kappakoṭisatasahassāni nirayena nirayaṁ vinipātena vinipātaṁ
analyzed: pāpa kammam katvā anekāni kappa koṭi sata sahassāni nirayena nirayam vinipātena vinipāta

original: gacchanto bahuṁ dukkhaṁ vedayissati, taṁ bhagavā jānamāno kāruññena devadattaṁ pabbājesi,
analyzed: gacchantaḥ bahum dukkham vedayissati tam bhagavā jānamānaḥ kāruññena devadattam pabbājesi

original: ‘mama sāsane pabbajitassa dukkhaṁ pariyantakataṁ bhavissatī’ti kāruññena garukaṁ
analyzed: mama sāsane pabbajitassa dukkham pariyanta katam bhavissati iti kāruññena garuka

original: dukkhaṁ lahukaṁ akāsi.
analyzed: dukkham lahukam akāsi

original: Yathā vā, mahārāja, dhanayasasiriñātibalena balavā puriso attano ñātiṁ vā mittaṁ
analyzed: yathā vā mahā rāja dhana yasa siri ñāti balena balavā purisaḥ attanaḥ ñātim vā mitta

original: vā raññā garukaṁ daṇḍaṁ dhārentaṁ attano bahuvissatthabhāvena samatthatāya garukaṁ
analyzed: vā raññā garukam daṇḍam dhārentam attanaḥ bahu vissattha bhāvena samattha tāya garuka

original: daṇḍaṁ lahukaṁ akāsi;
analyzed: daṇḍam lahukam akāsi

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, bhagavā bahūni kappakoṭisatasahassāni dukkhaṁ vedayamānaṁ devadattaṁ pabbājetvā sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttibalasamatthabhāvena garukaṁ dukkhaṁ lahukaṁ akāsi.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja bhagavā bahūni kappa koṭi sata sahassāni dukkham vedayamānam devadattam pabbājetvā sīla samādhi paññā vimutti bala samattha bhāvena garukam dukkham lahukam akāsi

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, kusalo bhisakko sallakatto garukaṁ rogaṁ balavosadhabalena lahukaṁ karoti;
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja kusalaḥ bhisakkaḥ sallakattaḥ garukam rogam balavosadha balena lahukam karoti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, bahūni kappakoṭisatasahassāni dukkhaṁ vedayamānaṁ devadattaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja bahūni kappa koṭi sata sahassāni dukkham vedayamānam devadatta

original: bhagavā rogaññutāya pabbājetvā kāruññabalo patthaddhadhammosadhabalena garukaṁ dukkhaṁ lahukaṁ akāsi.
analyzed: bhagavā rogaññu tāya pabbājetvā kāruñña balaḥ patthaddha dhamma usadha balena garukam dukkham lahukam akāsi

original: Api nu kho so, mahārāja, bhagavā bahuvedanīyaṁ devadattaṁ appavedanīyaṁ karonto kiñci apuññaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti?
analyzed: api nu kho saḥ mahā rāja bhagavā bahu vedanīyam devadattam appa vedanīyam karontaḥ kiñci apuññam āpajjeyya ati

original: “Na kiñci, bhante, apuññaṁ āpajjeyya antamaso gaddūhanamattampī”ti.
analyzed: na kiñci bhante apuññam āpajjeyya antamasaḥ gaddūhana mattam pi iti

original: “Imampi kho, mahārāja, kāraṇaṁ atthato sampaṭiccha, yena kāraṇena bhagavā devadattaṁ pabbājesi.
analyzed: imam pi kho mahā rāja kāraṇam atthataḥ sampaṭiccha yena kāraṇena bhagavā devadattam pabbājesi

original: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi, yena kāraṇena bhagavā devadattaṁ pabbājesi.
analyzed: aparam pi mahā rāja uttarim kāraṇam suṇohi yena kāraṇena bhagavā devadattam pabbājesi

original: Yathā, mahārāja, coraṁ āgucāriṁ gahetvā rañño dasseyyuṁ, ‘ayaṁ kho, deva, coro āgucārī, imassa yaṁ icchasi, taṁ daṇḍaṁ paṇehī’ti.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja coram āgu cārim gahetvā raññaḥ dasseyyu ayam kho deva coraḥ āgu cārī imassa yam icchasi tam daṇḍam paṇehi iti

original: Tamenaṁ rājā evaṁ vadeyya ‘tena hi, bhaṇe, imaṁ coraṁ bahinagaraṁ nīharitvā āghātane sīsaṁ chindathā’ti.
analyzed: tam enam rājā evam vadeyya tena hi bhaṇe imam coram bahi nagaram nīharitvā āghātane sīsam chindatha ati

original: ‘Evaṁ, devā’ti kho te rañño paṭissutvā taṁ bahinagaraṁ nīharitvā āghātanaṁ nayeyyuṁ.
analyzed: eva deva iti kho te raññaḥ paṭissutvā tam bahi nagaram nīharitvā āghātanam nayeyyu

original: Tamenaṁ passeyya kocideva puriso rañño santikā laddhavaro laddhayasadhanabhogo ādeyyavacano
analyzed: tam enam passeyya kocid eva purisaḥ rañño santikā laddha varaḥ laddha yasa dhana bhogaḥ ādeyya vacanaḥ

original: balavicchitakārī, so tassa kāruññaṁ katvā te purise evaṁ vadeyya ‘alaṁ, bho, kiṁ
analyzed: bala vicchita kārī so tassa kāruññam katvā te purise evam vadeyya ala bho kiṃ

original: tumhākaṁ imassa sīsacchedanena, tena hi bho imassa hatthaṁ vā pādaṁ vā chinditvā
analyzed: tumhākam imassa sīsa chedanena tena hi bho imassa hattham vā pādam vā chinditvā

original: jīvitaṁ rakkhatha, ahametassa kāraṇā rañño santike paṭivacanaṁ karissāmī’ti.
analyzed: jīvitam rakkhatha aham etassa kāraṇā rañño santike paṭivacanam karissāmi iti

original: Te tassa balavato vacanena tassa corassa hatthaṁ vā pādaṁ vā chinditvā jīvitaṁ rakkheyyuṁ.
analyzed: te tassa balavataḥ vacanena tassa corassa hattham vā pādam vā chinditvā jīvitam rakkheyyu

original: Api nu kho so, mahārāja, puriso evaṁ kārī tassa corassa kiccakārī assā”ti?
analyzed: api nu kho saḥ mahā rāja purisaḥ evam kārī tassa corassa kicca kārī assa ati

original: “Jīvitadāyako so, bhante, puriso tassa corassa, jīvite dinne kiṁ tassa akataṁ nāma atthī”ti?
analyzed: jīvita dāyakaḥ saḥ bhante puriso tassa corassa jīvite dinne kim tassa akatam nāma atthi iti

original: “Yā pana hatthapādacchedane vedanā, so tāya vedanāya kiñci apuññaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti?
analyzed: yā pana hattha pāda chedane vedanā saḥ tāya vedanāya kiñci apuññam āpajjeyya ati

original: “Attano katena so, bhante, coro dukkhavedanaṁ vedayati, jīvitadāyako pana puriso na kiñci apuññaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti.
analyzed: attano katena so bhante coraḥ dukkha vedanam vedayati jīvita dāyakaḥ pana puriso na kiñci apuññam āpajjeyya ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, bhagavā kāruññena devadattaṁ pabbājesi ‘mama sāsane pabbajitassa dukkhaṁ pariyantakataṁ bhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja bhagavā kāruññena devadattam pabbājesi mama sāsane pabbajitassa dukkham pariyanta katam bhavissati iti

original: Pariyantakatañca, mahārāja, devadattassa dukkhaṁ, devadatto, mahārāja, maraṇakāle—
analyzed: pariyantaka tat ca mahā rāja devadattassa dukkha devadattaḥ mahā rāja maraṇa kāle

original: ‘Imehi aṭṭhīhi tamaggapuggalaṁ,
analyzed: imehi aṭṭhīhi ta magga puggala

original: Devātidevaṁ naradammasārathiṁ;
analyzed: devātidevam naradamma sārathi

original: Samantacakkhuṁ satapuññalakkhaṇaṁ,
analyzed: samanta cakkhum sata puñña lakkhaṇa

original: Pāṇehi buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ upemī’ti.
analyzed: pāṇehi buddham saraṇam upemi iti

original: Pāṇupetaṁ saraṇamagamāsi.
analyzed: pāṇupetam saraṇam agamāsi

original: Devadatto, mahārāja, cha koṭṭhāse kate kappe atikkante paṭhamakoṭṭhāse saṅghaṁ bhindi, pañca koṭṭhāse niraye paccitvā tato muccitvā aṭṭhissaro nāma paccekabuddho bhavissati.
analyzed: devadattaḥ mahā rāja cha koṭṭhāse kate kappe atikkante paṭhama koṭṭhāse saṅgham bhindi pañca koṭṭhāse niraye paccitvā tatas muccitvā aṭṭhissaraḥ nāma paccekabuddhaḥ bhavissati

original: Api nu kho so, mahārāja, bhagavā evaṁ kārī devadattassa kiccakārī assā”ti?
analyzed: api nu kho saḥ mahā rāja bhagavā evam kārī devadattassa kicca kārī assa ati

original: “Sabbadado, bhante nāgasena, tathāgato devadattassa, yaṁ tathāgato devadattaṁ paccekabodhiṁ pāpessati, kiṁ tathāgatena devadattassa akataṁ nāma atthī”ti?
analyzed: sabbadadaḥ bhante nāgasena tathāgataḥ devadattassa yam tathāgataḥ devadattam paccekabodhim pāpessati kim tathāgatena devadattassa akatam nāma atthi iti

original: “Yaṁ pana, mahārāja, devadatto saṅghaṁ bhinditvā niraye dukkhavedanaṁ vedayati, api nu kho bhagavā tatonidānaṁ kiñci apuññaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti?
analyzed: yam pana mahā rāja devadattaḥ saṅgham bhinditvā niraye dukkha vedanam vedayati api nu kho bhagavā tatonidānam kiñci apuññam āpajjeyya ati

original: “Na hi, bhante, attanā katena, bhante, devadatto kappaṁ niraye paccati, dukkhapariyantakārako satthā na kiñci apuññaṁ āpajjatī”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhante attanā katena bhante devadatto kappam niraye paccati dukkha pariyanta kārako satthā na kiñci apuññam āpajjati iti

original: “Imampi kho tvaṁ, mahārāja, kāraṇaṁ atthato sampaṭiccha, yena kāraṇena bhagavā devadattaṁ pabbājesi.
analyzed: imam pi kho tva mahā rāja kāraṇam atthataḥ sampaṭiccha yena kāraṇena bhagavā devadattam pabbājesi

original: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi, yena kāraṇena bhagavā devadattaṁ pabbājesi.
analyzed: aparam pi mahā rāja uttarim kāraṇam suṇohi yena kāraṇena bhagavā devadattam pabbājesi

original: Yathā, mahārāja, kusalo bhisakko sallakatto vātapittasemhasannipātautupariṇāmavisamaparihāraopakkamikopakkantaṁ
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kusalaḥ bhisakkaḥ sallakattaḥ vāta pitta semha sannipāta otu pariṇāma visama parihāra opakkamika upakkanta

original: pūtikuṇapaduggandhābhisañchannaṁ antosallaṁ susiragataṁ pubbaruhirasampuṇṇaṁ vaṇaṁ
analyzed: pūti kuṇapa duggandha abhisañchannam antosallam susira gatam pubbaruhira sampuṇṇam vaṇa

original: vūpasamento vaṇamukhaṁ kakkhaḷatikhiṇakhārakaṭukena bhesajjena anulimpati paripaccanāya,
analyzed: vūpasamentaḥ vaṇa mukham kakkhaḷa tikhiṇa khāra kaṭukena bhesajjena anulimpati paripaccanāya

original: paripaccitvā mudubhāvamupagataṁ satthena vikantayitvā ḍahati salākāya, daḍḍhe khāralavaṇaṁ
analyzed: paripaccitvā mudu bhāvam upagatam satthena vikantayitvā ḍahati salākāya daḍḍhe khāra lavaṇa

original: deti, bhesajjena anulimpati vaṇaruhanāya byādhitassa sotthibhāvamanuppattiyā, api
analyzed: deti bhesajjena anulimpati byādhitassa sotthi bhāvam anuppattiyā api

original: nu kho so, mahārāja, bhisakko sallakatto ahitacitto bhesajjena anulimpati, satthena
analyzed: nu kho saḥ mahā rāja bhisakkaḥ sallakattaḥ ahita cittaḥ bhesajjena anulimpati satthena

original: vikanteti, ḍahati salākāya, khāralavaṇaṁ detī”ti?
analyzed: vikantā iti ḍahati salākāya khāra lavaṇam deti iti

original: “Na hi, bhante, hitacitto sotthikāmo tāni kiriyāni karotī”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhante hita citto sotthi kāmo tāni kiriyāni karoti iti

original: “Yā panassa bhesajjakiriyākaraṇena uppannā dukkhavedanā, tatonidānaṁ so bhisakko sallakatto kiñci apuññaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti?
analyzed: yā panassa bhesajja kiriyā karaṇena uppannā dukkha vedanā tatonidānam saḥ bhisakkaḥ sallakatto kiñci apuññam āpajjeyya ati

original: “Hitacitto, bhante, sotthikāmo bhisakko sallakatto tāni kiriyāni karoti, kiṁ so tatonidānaṁ apuññaṁ āpajjeyya, saggagāmī so, bhante, bhisakko sallakatto”ti.
analyzed: hita cittaḥ bhante sotthi kāmaḥ bhisakkaḥ sallakatto tāni kiriyāni karoti kim saḥ tatonidānam apuññam āpajjeyya sagga gāmī saḥ bhante bhisakkaḥ sallakatto ti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, kāruññena bhagavā devadattaṁ pabbājesi dukkhaparimuttiyā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja kāruññena bhagavā devadattam pabbājesi dukkha parimuttiyā

original: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi, yena kāraṇena bhagavā devadattaṁ pabbājesi.
analyzed: aparam pi mahā rāja uttarim kāraṇam suṇohi yena kāraṇena bhagavā devadattam pabbājesi

original: Yathā, mahārāja, puriso kaṇṭakena viddho assa, athaññataro puriso tassa hitakāmo
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja purisaḥ kaṇṭakena viddhaḥ assa athaññataraḥ puriso tassa hita kāmo

original: sotthikāmo tiṇhena kaṇṭakena vā satthamukhena vā samantato chinditvā paggharantena
analyzed: sa utthi kāmaḥ tiṇhena kaṇṭakena vā sattha mukhena vā samantataḥ chinditvā paggharantena

original: lohitena taṁ kaṇṭakaṁ nīhareyya, api nu kho so, mahārāja, puriso ahitakāmo taṁ kaṇṭakaṁ nīharatī”ti?
analyzed: lohitena tam kaṇṭakam nīhareyya api nu kho saḥ mahā rāja purisaḥ ahita kāmaḥ tam kaṇṭakam nīharati iti

original: “Na hi, bhante, hitakāmo so, bhante, puriso sotthikāmo taṁ kaṇṭakaṁ nīharati.
analyzed: na hi bhante hita kāmo saḥ bhante purisaḥ sotthi kāmo tam kaṇṭakam nīharati

original: Sace so, bhante, taṁ kaṇṭakaṁ na nīhareyya, maraṇaṁ vā so tena pāpuṇeyya maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhan”ti.
analyzed: sace saḥ bhante tam kaṇṭakam na nīhareyya maraṇam vā saḥ tena pāpuṇeyya maraṇa mattam vā dukkhanti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato kāruññena devadattaṁ pabbājesi dukkhaparimuttiyā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgataḥ kāruññena devadattam pabbājesi dukkha parimuttiyā

original: Sace, mahārāja, bhagavā devadattaṁ na pabbājeyya, kappakoṭisatasahassampi devadatto bhavaparamparāya niraye pacceyyā”ti.
analyzed: sace mahā rāja bhagavā devadattam na pabbājeyya kappa koṭi sata sahassam pi devadattaḥ bhava paramparāya niraye pacceyya ati

original: “Anusotagāmiṁ, bhante nāgasena, devadattaṁ tathāgato paṭisotaṁ pāpesi, vipanthapaṭipannaṁ
analyzed: anusota gāmi bhante nāgasena devadattam tathāgataḥ paṭisotam vipantha paṭipanna

original: devadattaṁ panthe paṭipādesi, papāte patitassa devadattassa patiṭṭhaṁ adāsi, visamagataṁ
analyzed: devadattam panthe paṭipādesi papāte patitassa devadattassa patiṭṭham adāsi visama gata

original: devadattaṁ tathāgato samaṁ āropesi.
analyzed: devadattam tathāgataḥ samam āropesi

original: Ime ca, bhante nāgasena, hetū imāni ca kāraṇāni na sakkā aññena sandassetuṁ aññatra tavādisena buddhimatā”ti.
analyzed: ime ca bhante nāgasena hetū imāni ca kāraṇāni na sakkā aññena sandassetum aññatra tava ādisena buddhimatā ati

original: Devadattapabbajjapañho tatiyo.
analyzed: devadatta pabbajja pañhaḥ tatiyaḥ
